metadata.description:
My brother June Jissle is a genius in every sense of the word. Last June when he dropped his instrumental EP, "June Le Fox" I immediately connected with this instrumental on the project and within 15 mins of hearing it I recorded this interpretation of what I got from the song. 

"This song is for the lovers in a little city building dreams of a world bigger than life with visions of seeing their stars in the walk of fame."

ENJOY!
 
Written & Performed By Scolla Fungwe
Engineered By Scolla Fungwe
Produced By June Jissle
Mixed & Mastered By Ashton Woods
Artwork By Scolla Fungwe

lyrics.text:
Verse:
Sleepless night cuz I'm up dreaming/
California sized big believer/
God shining on me I've been waiting on the feeling/
You showered love on me and I'll forever give you the same/
(That full abundant loving)
Forever's just a moment away/

Chorus:
We should go dance in Leimert Dance/
(Dancing outside, Dreaming out loud)
We could hold hands while we dream of our Hollywood stars/
(Dreaming out loud)
We should go dance in Leimert Dance/

Verse 2:
Ever since I was a jit-ling, riding round the city on ten speeds/
I had cali big dreams/
Me and you on big screens/
Re-enacting love jones,
tell lil baby come home/
I know it gets scary girl
but this ain't what you run from,
come dream/
We'll be outside enormous living/

Chorus:
We should go dance in Leimert Dance/
(Dancing outside, Dreaming out loud)
We could hold hands while we dream of our Hollywood stars/
(Dreaming out loud)
We should go dance in Leimert Dance/

metadata.name: Leimert Park #1
metadata.title: Leimert Park
